mysteryDungeon:ExplorersDeck.NAME: Explorer's deck
mysteryDungeon:ExplorersDeck.DESCRIPTION: Will become a deck of 5 cards once you choose your explorer.

mysteryDungeon:PartnersDeck.NAME: Partner's Deck
mysteryDungeon:PartnersDeck.DESCRIPTION: Will become a deck of 5 cards once you choose your partner.

mysteryDungeon:ColorlessAgility.NAME: Agility
mysteryDungeon:ColorlessAgility.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:ChooseAttack.NAME: Attack
mysteryDungeon:ChooseAttack.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Attack to your hand.

mysteryDungeon:ChooseSkill.NAME: Skill
mysteryDungeon:ChooseSkill.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Skill to your hand.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurBulletSeed.NAME: Bullet Seed
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurBulletSeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Can be upgraded multiple times.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurChlorophyll.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL If you drew an Attack, gain 1 Strength.
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurChlorophyll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL For each Attack drawn this way, gain 1 Strength.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurDoubleEdge.NAME: Double Edge
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurDoubleEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Strength equal to the unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurDoubleEdge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain Strength equal to the unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurExplorerForm.NAME: Explorer Form
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurExplorerForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. NL At the start of your turn lose 1 Dexterity.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurFrenzyPlant.NAME: Frenzy Plant
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurFrenzyPlant.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Apply 2 Poison !M! times. NL You cannot heal during this turn.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurGigaDrain.NAME: Giga Drain
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurGigaDrain.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Heal HP equal to unblocked damage.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurIngrain.NAME: Ingrain
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurIngrain.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 mysterydungeon:Leech_Seed to a random enemy !M! times. NL Lose 2 Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurMegaDrain.NAME: Mega Drain
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurMegaDrain.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP per different *debuff on the enemy.
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurMegaDrain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP per different *debuff on the enemy. NL Next turn draw 1 more card.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPetalDance.NAME: Petal Dance
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPetalDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies at the end of your turn for the next !M! turns. NL This damage behaves like Attack damage.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPoisonJab.NAME: Poison Jab
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPoisonJab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison 2 times.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurProtect.NAME: Protect
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurProtect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You cannot gain Block from cards during the next !M! turns.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSecretPower.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add random Power in your hand. NL Exhaust
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSecretPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add random upgraded Power in your hand. NL Exhaust

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSolarBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! less cards during your next turn.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurStrengthSap.NAME: Strength Sap
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurStrengthSap.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Strength if enemy lost Strength that way. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSunnyDay.NAME: Sunny Day

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSunnyDay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, NL draw one more card and reduce by 1 the cost of the card with the highest cost in your hand.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSynthesis.NAME: Synthesis
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL At the start of your next turn, NL draw 2 more cards and gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:PikachuSwift.NAME: Swift
mysteryDungeon:PikachuSwift.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! cards.

mysteryDungeon:PikachuThunder.NAME: Thunder
mysteryDungeon:PikachuThunder.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you evoke an Orb, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:PikachuThunderbolt.NAME: Thunderbolt
mysteryDungeon:PikachuThunderbolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL If the last card played was a skill, gain [E].

mysteryDungeon:PikachuThundershock.NAME: Thundershock
mysteryDungeon:PikachuThundershock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are not in a stance, gain [E]

mysteryDungeon:PikachuThunderwave.NAME: Thunder Wave
mysteryDungeon:PikachuThunderwave.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! more Block if you are not in a stance.
mysteryDungeon:PikachuThunderwave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: mysterydungeon:Inert. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! more Block if you are not in a stance.

mysteryDungeon:PikachuVoltSwitch.NAME: Volt Switch
mysteryDungeon:PikachuVoltSwitch.DESCRIPTION: mysterydungeon:Inert. NL Retain. NL Choose between mysterydungeon:Positive_Stance or mysterydungeon:Negative_Stance and enter the chosen Stance. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:PikachuVoltSwitch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: mysterydungeon:Inert. NL Retain. NL Choose between mysterydungeon:Positive_Stance or mysterydungeon:Negative_Stance and enter the chosen Stance.

mysteryDungeon:PikachuVoltTackle.NAME: Volt Tackle
mysteryDungeon:PikachuVoltTackle.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! Lightning. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:PikachuWildCharge.NAME: Wild Charge
mysteryDungeon:PikachuWildCharge.DESCRIPTION: mysterydungeon:Inert. NL Evoke all orbs twice.

mysteryDungeon:PikachuZapCannon.NAME: Zap Cannon
mysteryDungeon:PikachuZapCannon.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Lightning per enemy. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleAquaRing.NAME: Aqua Ring
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleAquaRing.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to !M! cards in your hand. NL For each card discarded this way, add a *Flinch in your hand.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleAquaRing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard up to !M! cards in your hand. NL For each card discarded this way, add an upgraded *Flinch in your hand.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleAquaTail.NAME: Aqua Tail
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleAquaTail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M! card. NL Draw !mysteryDungeon:M2! card. NL Discard !mysteryDungeon:M3! card.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleAquaTail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M! card. NL Draw !mysteryDungeon:M2! card. NL Discard !mysteryDungeon:M3! card.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleBide.NAME: Bide
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleBide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Until next turn, when you get attacked, gain !M! Temporary Strength.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleBodyPress.NAME: Body Press
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleBodyPress.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Add !M! *Flinch into your hand. They cost 0 this turn.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleBodyPress.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Add !M! upgraded *Flinch into your hand. They cost 0 this turn.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleBrine.NAME: Brine
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleBrine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If your draw pile has equal or more cards than your discard pile, deal !D! damage.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleDive.NAME: Dive
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleDive.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all your statuses. NL Add !M! *Hazes in random locations in your draw pile and discard pile. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleDoubleTeam.NAME: Double Team
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleDoubleTeam.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. When drawn: add a copy of this card in your hand. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleEndure.NAME: Endure
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleEndure.DESCRIPTION: When you play a status, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL This damage behaves like Attack damage.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleExplorerForm.NAME: Explorer Form
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleExplorerForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn draw one more card and increase this gain by one.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleExplorerForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn draw one more card and increase this gain by one.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleFakeOut.NAME: Fake Out
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleFakeOut.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Scry !M! card. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleFakeOut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Scry !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleFlashCannon.NAME: Flash Cannon
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleFlashCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your discard pile.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleFlashCannon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your discard pile + 3.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleFlinch.NAME: Flinch
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleFlinch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL Scry !M! card. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleFlinch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL Scry !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleFlipTurn.NAME: Flip Turn
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleFlipTurn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL draw !M! card. NL Discard !M! card.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleFlipTurn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL draw !M! cards. NL Discard !M! cards.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleGyroBall.NAME: Gyro Ball
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleGyroBall.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 *Freeze to your hand. NL Deal !D! damage per status in your hand. NL Discard ALL Statuses in your hand.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleHail.NAME: Hail
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleHail.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw cards, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleHaze.NAME: Haze
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleHaze.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Add !M! *Freeze to your discard pile.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleHaze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Add !M! *Freeze to your discard pile.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleHydroCannon.NAME: Hydro Cannon
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleHydroCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle 2 *Freeze into your draw pile.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleIceBeam.NAME: Ice Beam
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleIceBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 *Freeze to your hand.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleProtect.NAME: Protect
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleProtect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You cannot gain Block during the next !M! turns.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleRainDance.NAME: Rain Dance
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleRainDance.DESCRIPTION: When a card is created this combat, gain !M! Temporary Strength.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleRainDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When a card is created this combat, gain !M! Temporary Strength.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleRainDish.NAME: Rain Dish
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleRainDish.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is manually scried or discarded, gain !M! Block.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleRainDish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever a card is manually scried or discarded, gain !M! Block.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleRapidSpin.NAME: Rapid Spin
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleRapidSpin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! artifact.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleScald.NAME: Scald
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleScald.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to !mysteryDungeon:M2! cards. Deal !D! damage and apply !M! mysterydungeon:Burn per card discarded that way.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleShellSmash.NAME: Shell Smash
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleShellSmash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Shuffle !mysteryDungeon:M2! *Freeze into your draw pile.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashGo.NAME: Skull Bash Go!
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashGo.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this is the leftmost card of your hand, deal another !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashGo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this is the leftmost card of your hand, deal another !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashReady.NAME: Skull Bash: Ready!
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashReady.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Skull *Bash: *Set in your draw pile.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashReady.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Shuffle a *Skull *Bash: *Set in your draw pile.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashSet.NAME: Skull Bash: Set!
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashSet.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a *Skull *Bash: *Go! into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashSet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Skull *Bash: *Go! into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSubstitute.NAME: Substitute
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSubstitute.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your draw pile. NL Add it to your hand and put a *Wound where the card was. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSubstitute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your draw pile. NL Add a copy of that card to your hand and put a *Wound at the card's location. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleTorrent.NAME: Torrent
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleTorrent.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, gain !M! Temporary Strength.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWaterSpout.NAME: Water Spout
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWaterSpout.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M! card. NL Apply !mysteryDungeon:M2! Weak. NL Deal !D! damage.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWaterSpout.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scry !M! cards. NL Apply !mysteryDungeon:M2! Weak. NL Deal !D! damage.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWhirlpool.NAME: Whirlpool
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWhirlpool.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your X next turns, draw 2 more cards and discard 2 cards. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWhirlpool.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your X+1 next turns, draw 2 more cards and discard 2 cards. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWithdraw.NAME: Withdraw
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWithdraw.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discard pile into your deck. NL Gain !M! Block per card in hand.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleZenHeadbutt.NAME: Zen Headbutt
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleZenHeadbutt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Create a *Flinch and add it to your hand.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleZenHeadbutt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Create an upgraded *Flinch and add it to your hand.

mysteryDungeon:TotodileWaterPledge.NAME: Water Pledge
mysteryDungeon:TotodileWaterPledge.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Frost orb. NL If you play another mysterydungeon:Pledge card this turn, activate a special effect.
